channel.title: 思考的力量 on 生活不在别处
channel.description: Recent content in 思考的力量 on 生活不在别处

item.title: 思考的力量 – Chinese more or less
item.description: NTU的华裔馆（Chinese Heritage Centre）举办一个“何谓华人”图片展，目的在于探索华人文化多样性以及华人在海外经历变化。从不同国家不同时

item.title: 思考的力量 — Team work
item.description: People are tempted to count on someone as a free guide naturally. It is similar in the team work. Those with less contribution always rely on the others because of the judgment as a group base. En.. that is right, but they should think about it, what the next? Team work does not like a friendship, although team sources is most likely to build such friendship. But please don’t abuse it!

item.title: 思考的力量 – 尊严从来不靠施舍
item.description: 19时50分，我又一次来到了香港机场。前几天的新疆骚乱，让我看得触目惊心，有什么比人的生命更重要？已经不需要再推究他们的无知，也不需要利用群
